name: VomiVore
description:
A Sci-Fi FPS where YOU are the monster!

VomiVore is a short game where you play as an Üzz Buzzbrain operative intent on destroying Starkurz and Larlik military personnel in the midst of a war! 

Game features:

  • The ability to vomit on your enemies!
  • The ability to vore your enemies' corpses!
  • Fairly short levels with oodles of hidden secrets!
  • Epic soundtrack (not stolen)
  • A game manual included! (must have for collectors!)
  • Deep lore that you can't understand because there is no comprehensive source yet lol (check out my game Peach Boys for more in this setting)

Soundtrack available here: VomiVore OST | Goose Egg (bandcamp.com)
